LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionA.label: Basic Construction
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionA.description: This important research allow you to produce Concrete, Paint, Glass and other basic constructions.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionB.label: Shielded Walls
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionB.description: Shielded Walls and doors are essential to protect your colony or build bunkers.
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionC.label: Armored Walls
LanguageData.SadjuukConstructionC.description: Develop Armored Walls and Doors, with the strongest materials.
